official-title.#text: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide for a grant program regarding firearms.

text.#text: provide for the seizure or surrender of firearms and ammunition described in

give State and local law enforcement the authority, to the extent allowable under Federal laws and the United States Constitution, to seize firearms or ammunition when responding to domestic violence situations where there is probable cause to believe such firearms and ammunition are contraband, illegally in the possession of the offender, have been or are likely to be used to threaten, harass, menace, or harm the victim, or may otherwise pose a danger to the victim.
